amendment.description: To permit USAID to modify the terms of guaranteed loans, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1980 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1980 proposed by Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S13344-13345; text: CR S13344) To permit USAID to modify the terms of guaranteed loans, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1980 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1980 proposed by Senator McConnell.
